Data: {"recipient_id": "639403c3-a885-43a1-8e23-d1367bc84df0", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
GOOD MORNING I would like to know why my profile was rejected and I would like you to approve it for advertising.

Good morning! I'm sorry to hear that your profile was rejected. Typically, this happens when we're unable to verify the business details you provided. To help resolve this, please provide the following information:

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
- Business URL

Once you have this information ready, please email it to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification. Our team will review your details and update you on your account status.

If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
HELLO
Hi there! How can I assist you today?

Company's EHID or DUNS number

is it mandatory?

Yes, providing your company's EHID or DUNS number is mandatory for the business verification process. This helps us ensure a secure and compliant advertising environment. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out!
I don't have
If you don't have an EHID or DUNS number, I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance. They can guide you on alternative steps for verification.
How can I get it?

To obtain a DUNS number, you can visit the official Dun & Bradstreet website and apply for one. It's a unique identifier for businesses and is used globally. If you need an EHID, you might want to check with your local business registration authority or government agency that issues these identifiers.
information has already been sent to the email

Great! Once our team receives your information, they will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
Thank You
You're welcome! Thanks for contacting us and we want to hear from you!
Can you check urgently? I've already sent the data to the email. We need to run ads.

I understand the urgency. If you've already sent the required information for business verification to adsupport@newsbreak.com, our team will review it as soon as possible. Please allow some time for them to process your request and update you on your account status. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
We will be running at least $600 a day, please help me

Thanks for sharing your daily ad spend. Currently, dedicated account management is reserved for advertisers who meet a daily spend threshold of $1,000 or more. If you’re not at that level yet, no worries — our self-serve platform has everything you need to launch and optimize your campaigns successfully. Our support team is also available via chat or email if you need any help. Let us know if you’d like assistance getting started.
I CAN ADVERTISE THIS DAILY VALUE WITHOUT PROBLEMS, BUT I ASK FOR ATTENTION TO

If you can meet the daily spend threshold of $1,000 or more, we can proceed with connecting you to a dedicated account manager. Please upload a media plan, billing statement, or screenshot showing this daily ad spend. Once verified, we’ll be happy to assist with your onboarding and connect you with a dedicated account manager. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!
No newsbreak estamos começando agora, não tenho gastos aqui ainda
We're just starting the newsbreak, I don't have any expenses here yet.

Entendi! Como você está começando agora no Newsbreak, recomendo utilizar nossa plataforma de autoatendimento, que possui todas as ferramentas necessárias para lançar e otimizar suas campanhas com sucesso. Nossa equipe de suporte também está disponível para ajudar via chat ou e-mail. Se precisar de mais alguma coisa ou tiver dúvidas sobre como começar, estou aqui para ajudar!
ok
Thanks for contacting us and we want to hear from you!

Got it! Since you're just starting with Newsbreak and don't have any expenses yet, I recommend using our self-serve platform. It has everything you need to launch and optimize your campaigns successfully. Our support team is also available via chat or email if you need any help. Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with!
I save the answer in the email
Great! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
